name: flwr truss plus (prototype)
description:
[RECOMMENDED SETTINGS: FULL SCREEN 640x480 OR LOWEST RESOLUTION]

[CONTAINS FLASHING COLORS]

in a place, there's some flwrs

look closely at the inside of boxes

look closely at portals

bring objects between portals

throw away items in the trashbin to discard them

put corresponding objects in outbox to achieve

Controls

WASD - Move

Q and E - Look up/down or left/right

Spacebar - Toggle look direction between up/down and left/right

Mouse - Click and hold flwrs

Credits

Art/Programming/Music by wednesday scones

Sfx made using Bfxr

psx_retroshader by dsoft20
